thread.title: Transcript: WSJ Interview With Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic

author: wsjcom
title: Transcript: WSJ Interview With Atlanta Fed President Raphael Bostic

organizations.name: wsj interview with atlanta fed president raphael bostic federal reserve bank of atlanta

text:
Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic spoke with Wall Street Journal reporter Nick Timiraos on Monday, March 26, in Atlanta. He discussed his outlook on employment, the prospect of additional interest-rate increases this year, and changes in U.S. trade and fiscal policy. He also praised San Francisco Fed President John Williams, the leading candidate to become the next president of the New York Fed. Here is a partial transcript of the interview, lightly edited for clarity and length.
